name: Hyatt Zilara Cancun - Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5 HZ, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hyatt Zilara Cancun Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cancun. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, separate living room, internet access – wireless, private pool. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km). For reliable service and professional staff, Hyatt Zilara Cancun Hotel caters to your needs.FarePortal

name: Turquoize at Hyatt Ziva Cancun - Adults Only
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote. 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo

name: Le Blanc Spa Resort - Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 10, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The award-winning, adults-only Le Blanc Spa Palace is regarded by many as one of the best hotels in the world. Pure luxury and elegance meet an incredible location, more than 20,000 m2 between the Caribbean Sea and the Nichupté Lagoon, enjoying stunning views. The hotel offers an excellent spa, various exceptional restaurants and a wonderful infinity pool, making it the ideal place for an unforgettable stay. SMOKE FREE PROPERTYFarePortal

name: The Tower by Temptation Cancun Resort - Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Libelula Tulum
address: Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila Km 10.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: When you stay at Libelula Tulum in Tulum, you'll be by the sea, just steps from Sian Ka'an Biosphere Reserve and Tulum Beach. Featured amenities include luggage storage and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Panamera
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km. 8.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, Hotel Panamera offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel every room includes bed linen and towels. At Hotel Panamera you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Tulum Archeological Site is 11 km from the accommodation, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 4.3 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 85 km from Hotel Panamera, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Boca Paila Km6.5, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a garden, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, every room includes a desk. The rooms include a coffee machine, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature sea views. At Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 84 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Orchid House Tulum
address: Aldea Zama, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Orchid House Tulum features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Tulum. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service and dry cleaning services. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. South Tulum Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Tulum Archeological Site is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 79 km from Orchid House Tulum.

name: The Beach Tulum
address: Road Tulum-Boca Paila km7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The adults-only The Beach Tulum Hotel offers a beautiful setting on Tulum Beach within 7 km of its famous Mayan Ruins. It features beach-front rooms with terraces and lounge area, an outdoor pool, beach club and a restaurant. Onsite Spa and onsite shop. Each luxurious, beach-front room has stylish, minimalist décor. Each air-conditioned accommodation includes free WiFi and a seating area. Guests can enjoy full breakfast either in the Ziggy's restaurant or Fresco's. Ziggy's Beach Club serves drinks and snacks from 09:00 until sunset. Tulum National Park is less than 4 km from the hotel, while the town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away. Cancún is within 140 km away and Playa del Carmen is within 60 km away.

name: Akkuun Tulum Adults Only
address: Carretera Tulum-boca Paila Km 5.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, 500 metres from South Tulum Beach, Akkuun Tulum - Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk. All rooms include a safety deposit box, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Akkuun Tulum - Adults Only the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 8.3 km from Akkuun Tulum - Adults Only, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 83 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dune Boutique Hotel Tulum - Adults Only
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km. 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi and a terrace, Dune Boutique Hotel located at the party zone Tulum offers accommodation in Tulum. There is a juice bar and guests can enjoy tropical cocktails at the bar. Some rooms feature views of the sea or garden. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy delicious drinks and cuisine at the Dune Restaurant and Beach Club under the shadow of the palm trees. This hotel has a private beach area and bike hire is available. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including snorkeling, windsurfing and diving. Parque Nacional Tulum is 2.9 km from Dune Boutique Hotel located at the party zone Tulum.

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka'an - Adult Only Hotel
address: Km 250 Carr Federal a Chetumal, 77729 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive is located in the Riviera Maya town of Akumal. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. The accommodation will provide you with air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath and a hairdryer. Extras include a seating area. At Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive you will find a tennis court and a fitness centre Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Xcacel-Xcacelito (5.5 km) and Kantenah Bay (23 km). This resort is 95 km from Cancún International Airport.

name: Uman Glamping & Cenote Tulum
address: Zona Hotelera Tulum
description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, Uman Glamping & Cenote Tulum offers accommodation with a garden, free WiFi, full-day security, and luggage storage space. Housed in a building dating from 2021, the luxury tent is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as snorkelling and canoeing. Towels and bed linen are offered in the luxury tent. The luxury tent offers a continental or American breakfast. Uman Glamping & Cenote Tulum offers an outdoor fireplace. A water park is available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Tulum Archeological Site is 13 km from Uman Glamping & Cenote Tulum, while Sian Ka´an Biosphere Reserve is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 87 km from the luxury tent, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: O Tulum - Adults Only
address: Tankah IV Lote 12, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Tulum in the Quintana Roo Region, 8 km from Tulum Archeological Site. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms come with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, and free toiletries. There is concierge service at the property. Free use of bicycles is available. The area is popular for snorkelling and diving. Bus station Tulum Ruins is 8 km from O'Tulum, while Tulum Bus station is 11 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 114 km from O'Tulum.

name: Chiringuito Tulum
address: Carretara Tulum Boca Paila Km 9.3, 77728 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Chiringuito Tulum is located in Tulum, within 2.3 km of Tulum Archeological Site and Cesiak. Around 5 km from Parque Nacional Tulum, the property is also 8 km away from Tulum Bus station and offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking throughout and is situated 9 km from Bus station Tulum Ruins. At the hotel every room includes a terrace. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Chiringuito Tulum also provide guests with a garden view. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. Ziggys is 1.6 km from Chiringuito Tulum. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 69 km from the hotel.

name: Mezzanine Tulum Colibri Boutique Hotels - Adults only
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila km 1.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Allow yourself the opportunity to enjoy. Enjoy happiness, rays of the sun, a beautiful beach and breathtaking views. Experience authentic Thai and delicious beach food prepared by our award-winning chef. Lose yourself while enjoying the view of the Caribbean Sea. Feel the fresh water and the warm sand beneath your feet as you experience one of the best beaches on the Yucatan Penninsula. Relish great service in a stunning, luxurious hotel. Mezzanine offers you that Mexican vacation you’ve been waiting for.

name: Be Tulum Beach & Spa Resort
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km.10, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel in Tulum Mexico offers 64 elegant suites. The hotel features 3 on-site restaurants, one bar and two outdoor swimming pools. Children from 13 and above are welcomed on this property. Be Tulum offers easy access to the Caribbean Sea and many recreational activities. Guests can go swimming with dolphins, snorkeling and fishing near the hotel. There are also many theme parks nearby, including Xcaret and Xel-Ha. Guest suites at the Be Tulum feature iPod docking stations and private balconies. Some suites are also equipped with private pools or hot tubs.

name: Kanan Tulum - Adults Only
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km 8, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Kanan Tulum is a unique eco-friendly spa hotel in Mexico's Caribbean coast. Located on the beach amid the Mayan jungle, it is placed in the middle of the bustling music and art scene, offering a wide range of events in and around the hotel. This adults-only hotel is an experience in its own right, marrying rustic elements with the finest woods and rich textiles.The labyrinth of treetop corridors, wooden staircases, nature portals and branch-woven walkways and nests, all create a sensation of a hidden jungle temple. Get pampered at Kumaru Spa, featuring a full menu of organic services, find adventure on the Caribbean Sea, with an array of beach activities available on-site or enjoy a delightful yoga class at our wooden yoga shala. Indulge in authentic gastronomy, locally sourced dining and drinks, including cocktails at our swim-up pool bar and drinks on our rooftop lounge. Stay tuned for our music events on weekends at our beach club featuring the finest DJs lineups. When you’re ready to explore and experience the magic of Tulum, you’ll find everything from the ancient Mayan ruins and scenic cenotes to unforgettable nature reserves and adventure parks within minutes of our hotel. Take the vacation you deserve at Tulum’s best environmentally conscious, adults-only Caribbean escape at Kanan Tulum

name: Azulik
address: Carretera Tulum-Ruinas Km. 5, 1 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Azulik is a private, adults-only beach resort and Mayan Wellness Centre. It features a secluded, clothing-optional beach which is perfect for sunbathing or swimming. Each spacious tree house is made from Mexican-royal-ebony Khatalosh and features floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural daylight, mosquito nets. The tree house's also have a private deck with outdoor day beds, seating areas and views of the lush jungle and the Caribbean Sea. The rooms are free of TV's, phone or electricity so you can relax and reconnect with nature. Azulik offers a magical experience, serving breakfast and lunch. Also a beach bar, a wonderful spa & beauty center. We also provide traditional Mayan massage and healing therapies, medicinal herbal baths and the traditional Mayan-sweat-lodge temazcal treatment. The units have a unique Mayan mosaic bath tub where you can have a special invigorating bath in rich mineralized cenote’s water, which is considered as sacred water within Mayan culture. Azulik is 3 km south of Tulum Archaeological Site and 4 km from Tulum town centre. Our Cancun International Airport is about a 90 minutes drive to Azulik's location.

name: Tago Tulum by G Hotels
address: Carretera Tulum - Boca Paila KM 6, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering a restaurant, Tago, this beachfront hotel is located in Tulum's hotel zone and offers free WiFi access to guests. Rooms at TagoTulum include a minibar and TV with satellite channels. Coffee-making facilities are provided and a private bathroom features a double shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Rooms boast garden or sea views with a private pool. A garden and 24-hour front desk service are available for guests' use. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk and luggage storage. Free parking is available. Our hotel boutique is 6 km from Tulum Archeological Site, 3.9 km from Parque Nacional Tulum, and 8.8 km from Cesiak.

name: Hotel Xcaret Arte - Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km. 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, 8.8 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers certain rooms with sea views, and each room is equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms at Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegan and gluten-free options. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkelling and cycling. ADO International Bus Station is 9 km from the accommodation, while Church of Guadalupe is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 27 km from Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only.

name: Impression Moxché by Secrets
address: Carr Tulum Playa Del Carmen km 294, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 1.3 km from Playa del Carmen Beach, Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 11 km from ADO International Bus Station and 11 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, the property provides a private beach area, as well as a bar. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for golfing. Guests can sing karaoke, plan their trips at the tour desk, or make use of the business centre. Church of Guadalupe is 7.4 km from Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only, while Kantenah Bay is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 43 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Barceló Maya Riviera - Adults only
address: Carretera Chetumal Puerto Juárez Km. 266,3|Xpuha |Quintana Roo|México, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Barcelo Maya Riviera (adults only), especially popular with honeymooners, is located around 20 km from Playa del Carmen. The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Río Secreto. For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 90 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The beach hotel has 850 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, a lift, air conditioning, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 5 restaurants. In a total 5 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Laundry / ironing service is available for a fee. For the concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Xcaret Mexico - All Parks / All Fun Inclusive
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juarez Km. 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Heaven at Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Km. 72 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: This stylish holiday resort is located in one of the most impressive and inspiring places of the world, right next to the beach and facing the warm waters of the Caribbean Sea. The resort offers an authentic rock star lifestyle experience for adults only and has its own private beach as well as various swimming pools. The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: El Dorado Maroma By Karisma - Adults Only
address: Carretera Cancun - Tulum Km. 55.3, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Maroma Beach and offering the renowned Gourmet Inclusive Experience by Karisma, El Dorado Maroma is a resort featuring 2 beachfront locations plus a beachfront wedding chapel. The full-service spa offers massages, facials, special body treatments and a beauty salon with an extra charge. The suites and rooms feature views of the lush tropical gardens, and are decorated with a contemporary Caribbean style. All feature air conditioning, ceiling fans, satellite TV, a minibar stock with beer, soft drinks, water and juices and a coffee maker. The bathroom is equipped with vanity mirrors, hairdryer, and a shower. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience offers different restaurants boasting a fusion of Mexican and Caribbean cuisine, typical dishes from the Orient at the restaurant, Italian cuisine, and a gourmet restaurant presenting an open-kitchen concept with burgers, tacos, fish, brochettes, BBQ and typical Spanish paella. There are several swim-up bars, a classic lounge bar and 24-hour room service. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 60-minute drive.

name: Royal Hideaway Playacar
address: Lote Hotelero No 6 Desarollo, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The Royal Hideaway Playacar Adults Only hotel is located on the white sands of an idyllic beach on the Riviera Maya and is very close to key points of interest such as Playa del Carmen. This adults only hotel is situated by the beach in Playacar zone, 4 km from the center of Playa del Carmen, 11 km from an amusement park, and 61 km from Cancun International Airport. Facilities and services include a 24-hour reception, air conditioning, bar, free car parking, meeting/ banquet facilities (extra charge), elevator, free Wi-Fi, garde, gym, ironing facilities, laundry facilities (extra charge), massage (extra charge), outdoor pool, restaurant, safe, terrace, and spa centre. Rooms feature air conditioning, TV, telephone, free Wi-Fi, mini bar, safe, coffee/ tea maker, bathroom, and hairdryer. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions. Address: Lote Hotelero No 6, Desarrollo Playacar, 77710, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, MexicoWebBeds

name: Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen
address: Calle 2 Norte Entre 5ta avenida y Zona Federal Marítima, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Well situated in Playa del Carmen, Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and room service. Certain units at the property feature a terrace with a sea view. At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms come with a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. At Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen you will find a restaurant serving Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 34 km from Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Valentin Imperial Maya - Adults Only
address: Carr.Fed.307 Chetumal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxurious resort is located 25 minutes from International Cancun Airport, 30 minutes from Cancun and only 20 minutes from Playa del Carmen. With more than half a mile white sand beach, located in Playa del Secreto (The Secret Beach) in the Riviera Maya.WebBeds

name: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel by Karisma - Adults only
address: KM.95 Carretera Cancun-Tulum Kantenah, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Playa Del Carmen. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the property are 24-hour front desk, valet parking, room service, airport transfer, car hire. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort make Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In the perfect choice for your stay in Playa Del Carmen.Agoda

name: Unico 20°n 87°w - Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Manzana 22 Carretera Chetumal-Pto Juare, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Akumal, a few steps from Kantenah Beach, Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 30 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 30 km from ADO International Bus Station, the property provides a range of water sports facilities, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms have air conditioning, and some units at Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only have a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Indonesian and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play billiards at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for snorkelling. Tulum Archeological Site is 33 km from Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only, while Xel Ha is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 45 km from the resort.

name: Mar del Cabo By Velas Resorts
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 18, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Fresh ocean breezes and the infinite azure tones of the Sea of Cortez welcome guests to Mar del Cabo. Unassuming and pleasing minimalist with touches of color and design, this boutique hotel is a place to enjoy the magical simplicity of sky, sea and soul. We invite visitors to enjoy the dramatic surroundings on a different level, with a soothing white canvas to calm the mind, and the perfect dose of culture and interest. Clean flavors, cold drinks, tranquil spaces nothing extra. Just you, in your element, surrounded by beauty.iHotelier/iStay

name: Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Golf & Spa Resort
address: Previo Paraiso Escondido, Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This impressive spa hotel has its own private beach and is located on the Pacific side, 5 minutes’ drive from Cabo San Lucas. Boasting fantastic views of the Pacific Ocean, it offers an award-winning spa and avant-garde design. The adults-only Pueblo Bonito Pacífica Resort & Spa has 5 restaurants, including one serving Mediterranean food and a Japanese restaurant serving fresh sushi. There are also 5 bars, one of which features a fire pit. The resort offers Balinese beds on the beach which you can hire for a day. From December to April the hotel arranges whale watching trips. The air-conditioned rooms at the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica feature tiled floors and soft tones. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a kitchenette and a private terrace. Cabo San Lucas Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away, and the hotel offers a shuttle service on request. The pretty coastal town of San José del Cabo is 35 minutes’ drive from the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica.

name: ME Cabo
address: Playa El Medano, 5, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: With its privileged location on the Medano Beach of Cabo San Lucas, ME Cabo features 5-star amenities in Los Cabos, one of Mexico’s fanciest destinations. Guest accommodations at ME Cabo are furnished with all the latest technologies. Private balconies along with rain showerhead and Aveda bath amenities are also provided. ME Cabo is a fashion and social hub for discerning local and international clientele, pulsating with a distinctive vibe that hints of celebrated hotspots. ME by Meliá blends design, art, music and service in a truly unconventional resort. And Aura hosts who welcome the opportunity to attend to your every wish and need. ME Cabo’s new hotspots include Confessions Skybar & Tapas, Taboo Beach Club, serving Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, Funky Geisha with beachside Asian fare and Mamazzita Mexican Soul with the best traditional cuisine. At only 10 minutes’ drive from downtown, ME Cabo hotel is just over half an hour away to the Airport.

name: Hotel El Ganzo Adults Only
address: Blvd Tiburon, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: All 70 guestrooms overlooking the Sea of Cortez are luxuriously appointed with modern, refined dcor with rustic undertones brought in with natural materials and woods throughout. A complimentary, fully stocked minibar, custom, artisan bath amenities, and wireless internet access are among the amenities.iHotelier/iStay

name: Marquis Los Cabos, Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM. 21.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of San Jose Del Cabo, Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Salon, executive floor, restaurant, bar, meeting facilities are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature executive lounge access, non smoking rooms, mini bar, inhouse movies, shower. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, hot tub, golf course (within 3 km), steamroom, spa. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that San Jose Del Cabo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury.Agoda

name: Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Puerto Los Cabos, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in the exclusive community of Puerto Los Cabos, Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Golf & Spa Resort offers adults a stunning Unlimited-Luxury® getaway in Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. The secure community around Secrets Puerto Los Cabos provides striking views of native flora and fauna and miles of unspoiled beachfront of the Sea of Cortez. The resort boasts 500 spacious non-smoking suites each with a private balcony or terrace, 24-hour room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, a Secrets Box for private in-suite dining and more. For added luxury, 150 ocean view suites are reserved for Preferred Club with access to additional privileges including a private lounge, upgraded amenities and mini-bar service, pillow menu, outdoor whirlpool and other extras. Unlimited-Luxury® continues throughout the resort where guests are treated to limitless gourmet fare and top-shelf spirits at elegant restaurants, bars and lounges. 24-hour dining options allow guests to enjoy late night bites at Coco Café. Or stay in and order room service. It's all available at any hour day or night. Indulge in the over 12,000 sq. ft. Secrets Spa by Pevonia and be treated to spa options in 21 treatment rooms, a full-service beauty salon or an extensive hydrotherapy circuit. Follow up this rejuvenation at the fully equipped fitness center or by taking part in one of many daily and nightly activities. Choose from a variety of beach, land and water activities, take a dip in one of two main heated pools, go on a leisurely walk along the 3 mile stretch of unspoiled Pacific Coast beach or catch the live nightly entertainment. Plus, the Puerto Los Cabos community provides, just steps away, a full service Marina with world-class sport fishing and artisan walkway, and the only composite 18-hole golf course in the area designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman.FarePortal

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Casa Velas Hotel Boutique & Ocean Club-Adults Only
address: Pelicanos 311 Fracc. Marina Vallarta, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Casa Velas – Adults only is ideally situated on the Marina Vallarta Golf Club in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, and features luxurious accommodations as well as first-class amenities and services. Casa Velas – Adults only is surrounded by a peaceful tropical environment. Guests at the hotel can relax in the large swimming pool, or enjoy a tropical drink on the beach or at the swim-up bar. The hotel also boasts a state-of-the-art fitness center as well as relaxing spa services at the on-site wellness center. A short distance from the Casa Velas – Adults only is the El Malecon, a beachfront boardwalk featuring restaurants, bars and shopping centers. The hotel also provides free shuttle service to and from Casa Velas Beach.

name: Quinta Maria Cortez
address: Sagitario 132, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located right on Conchas Chinas Beach, the adults-only Quinta Maria Cortez offers an outdoor pool, gardens and elegant suites with balconies and free Wi-Fi. Puerto Vallarta is 3 km away. Each spacious suite features classic-style décor and antique Mexican furniture. All suites have a seating area, a coffee maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most suites offer ocean views and many have kitchen facilities. Free breakfast is served in the palapa-covered dining area from Monday to Saturday. Sunday breakfast is available at La Playita beach restaurant, located a 5-minute walk away. Other local restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Quinta Maria Cortez can arrange excursions on request, including fishing trips and jungle tours. Staff can also organize transfers to Puerto Vallarta International Airport, located around 12 km away. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Villa Lala Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Carretera Barra De Navidad Km. 16.8, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Boca de Tomatlán in Puerto Vallarta, Villa Lala Boutique Hotel Adults Only is surrounded by mountains and faces the waterfront. It has free WiFi access available. The suites are brightly decorated in red colours and are spacious. They are equipped with 450 thread-count Egyptian cotton linens, bathrobes, LCD flat-screen HD TVs and are air conditioned. Puerto Vallarta city centre can be reached in a 30-minute drive and there guests will be able to find and explore a variety of restaurants and bistros. The Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 45 minutes’ drive away.
